nodes.bodyText: Please fix the indentation of this file to use 2 space of tab
As discussed offline, please consider generalize this file to easier adding configs for other dialects.

Java has it's own pair class. Any reason to create another pair class here?
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/javafx/api/javafx/util/Pair.html

For some reason, Intellij + maven is giving me difficulties with javafx (this was why I decided to do it myself originally). I have deleted the class and used import internal.net.http.common.Pair instead
So turns out that package isn't that great to work with either. This one was the one that worked in the end: org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.MutablePair
